message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with handwritten word recognition, which is a common problem in computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CV and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a novel approach using zone segmentation, which involves modeling and classification techniques, making cs.IR and cs.LG likely sub-categories as well. Finally, the use of HMMs and PHOG features suggests that cs.AI is also a possible sub-category.
